column4: i have ubuntu-restricted-extrasinstaled how come i can't play mp3

hello please
how to play mp3 in ubuntu liveCD

i need to install mpeg-1 layer3
pls
tell me how
i just want to play mp3
tell me fastest way
install ubuntu-restricted-extras package
i did
what now
perhaps the w32codecs from medibuntu.org
go to the website, no need for the dramatics
go to the website www.medibuntu.org
then select the w32codecs deb file to download.
then double click it, or open with gdebi
no cursing here
you have been told multiple times, how to do this. Please do so and stop repeating.
you dont know how to explain anything, thanks for teaching me how to double click though, because that was obviously the main issue here
no need for the attitude. we are volunteers here.
you're like the volunteers at the old folks home, giving the same robotic and depressing smalltalk
